channel.title: amy on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in amy on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Amy
item.description: 1:00am Saturday 9 March 2002 I have fallen in love with Amy even more today but she's MARRIED I had to keep telling myself and remind myself how horrible it was with a married couple as I screwed around with the wife. Not that Amy has given me any indication that she would partake in any indescretion (right word?) except being smily and happy and a tad flirtatious. As Amy and I were leaving Mission Burrito (after a lovely lunch) in her BMW, I was watching traffic as she planned to turn right though there was a big truck blocking our view of the traffic and she saw me loooking and guessed (correctly) I was maybe a bit nervous, put her hand up to block my eyes saying, "
